name: Calma
description:
Calma is a simple minimalistic puzzler! The aim is to collect all the balls by rolling a cube and expand your "garden". But beware! The cones must not be touched, and the path must not be left. A game with a chill factor: Relaxing music accompanies over 50 tricky little levels.

Not in chill mode? Then you can also rush through the puzzles and complete the game as quickly as possible.

But treat yourself to a little relaxation, Calma costs less than a coffee to go and you are supporting a passionate indie developer.

Many Thanks.
